text: Ate tam ki alaha dhokhobaza maradam, dhokhebaza auratam ate musarika (alaha da sarika manana vale). Maradam ate musarika auratam nu saza deve jihare alaha bare mare khi'ala rakhade hana. Bura'i da cakara unham te hai ate unham te hi alaha da' gusa pragata ho'i'a ate unham nu hi usa ne lahanata pa'i ate unham la'i hi usa ne naraka ti'ara kara rakhi'a hai ate iha bahuta baî€¼ura tikana hai
